languages.text: Плюет в цель комком слизи который при попадании окутывает область ядовитым газом 3х3 клетки. Наносит токсичный урон 10-15 ед и навешивает Отравление (6).

traits.locale_text: Плюет в цель комком слизи который при попадании окутывает область ядовитым газом 3х3 клетки. Наносит токсичный урон 10-15 ед и навешивает Отравление (6).

languages.text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Это существо плюет в цель слизью, создавая токсичную область 3×3 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо перемещается в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает <u>(от 10 до 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: This creature spits slime into a target creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> toxic damage and toxin (6).

This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

languages.text: Bu yaratık, hedef yaratığa balçık tükürerek 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren 3×3'lük toksik bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, <u>(10 ila 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksine{/g} (6) maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, hedef yaratığa balçık tükürerek 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren 3x3'lük toksik bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, <u>(10 ila 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksine{/g} (6) maruz kalır.

languages.text: Esta criatura escupe una baba viscosa a una criatura objetivo, creando una zona tóxica de 3×3 casillas que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Toda criatura que entre en esta zona (o se encuentre en ella cuando se aplica el efecto) sufre <u>(de 10 a 15)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura escupe una baba viscosa a una criatura objetivo, creando una zona tóxica de 3×3 casillas que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Toda criatura que entre en esta zona (o se encuentre en ella cuando se aplica el efecto) sufre <u>(de 10 a 15)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6).

languages.text: 此生物向目标生物喷射黏液，形成一片3x3的毒素区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入毒素区域的生物（或是此效果施加时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到<u>10-15</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6）效果。
languages.original_text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: 此生物向目标生物喷射黏液，形成一片3x3的毒素区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入毒素区域的生物（或是此效果施加时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到<u>10-15</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6）效果。

languages.text: Cette créature crache du mucus sur la cible pour créer une zone toxique de 3×3 cases qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent <u>de 10 à 15</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Cette créature crache du mucus sur la cible pour créer une zone toxique de 3×3 cases qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent <u>de 10 à 15</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6).

languages.text: この生物は、ターゲット生物に粘液を吐き、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する3×3の毒性エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、<u>（10～15）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}（6）を受ける。
languages.original_text: This creature spits slime at target creature, creating a 3×3 toxic area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: この生物は、ターゲット生物に粘液を吐き、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する3×3の毒性エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、<u>（10～15）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}（6）を受ける。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur speit Schleim auf das Ziel und erzeugt einen 3×3 Felder großen toxischen Bereich, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten (oder sich zu Beginn des Effektes darin aufhalten), erleiden <u>(10 bis 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (6).
